modName: Tame the Beasts of Skyrim II - Spelling and Lore-Friendly Patch with TES5Cleaned Tame Beast.esp
summary:
A mod that makes small changes to the dialogue of Roseria and Malbros, changes the notes, quest journals, and books to make it more lore-friendly, changes the front door so it meets the ground, and gives Roseria the Breeder a new voice.
Also adds an optional mod as well for a "cleaned" version of the Tame Beast.esp.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u]Tame the Beasts of Skyrim II - Spelling, Grammar, and Lore-Friendly Patch
[/u][i]By: Dragonaion[/i]

[b]These are patches![/b] Please download the original mod by [b]TheSkoomaKing[/b]: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50698/?

I created this mod specifically because there were so many little things that bothered me to the point of making TtBoS2 completely unusable for me. This modifies a few things so that the writing, dialogue, and Thu'um description is more lore-friendly and has the spelling and grammar errors remedied.
(To keep things tidy, older versions of the mod will be deleted so only one version of the main file can be downloaded)


[b][u]Please Note![/u][/b]
If you have Lillehus Home, put this mod after TameBeasts.esp [b]and[/b] Lillehus.esp
[list]
[*]This is due to the fact that this patch changes the environment to "fix" the door problem in front of the petshop. Lillehus will overwrite the changes, and will make it seem like there is still a "bench" in front of the petshop door.

[/list][/center]
--
[u]Changes[/u]:

Dialogue:
[list][*]Fixes minor spelling and grammar mistakes with Malbros' subtitled speech[/*]
[/list][list][*]Rewrites the dialogue with Roselia the Breeder
[/*][*]Adds a new (my) voice to Roselia the Breeder with the new dialogue[/*]
[*]Pet speech has been rewritten to fix grammar and spelling mistakes[/*]
[*]PC speech options have been rewritten to fix grammar and spelling mistakes[/*]
[/list]
Writing:[list][*]Changes The Art of Taming I, II, and Horses to be more lore-friendly and with fixed grammar and spelling mistakes[/*]
[*]Dragon notes in the Dragon Book quest have been rewritten to be more lore-friendly[/*]
[*]All letters from Roselia have been rewritten to be more lore-friendly and with fixed grammar and spelling mistakes
[/*][/list][list][*]Breeder notes have been rewritten to be "Pet Shop Flyers" with fixed grammar and spelling mistakes[/*]
[*]Quest journals have been rewritten to fix grammar mistakes and make it more lore-friendly
[/*][/list]
World:[list][*]Raises the ground to meet the front door so there isn't a "bench" right in front of the door[/*]
[*]Roselia's Fox's cage has been made larger with a rug, silver plate, and silver bowl placed inside[/*]
[*]The Art of Taming II is on the desk inside the Pet Shop beside the other two books[/*]
[/list]
Thu'um/Shout:[list][*]Rewrote the "Tame Beast: Tame Beast" shout description to be more lore-friendly
[/*][*]The words of power translations right underneath have been written to look like other shout descriptions[/*]
[/list]
(4.0) Spells:
[list][*]Rewrote the spell names & descriptions to remove grammar and spelling mistakes, and to make it more lore-friendly[/*]
[/list]
---------------
[u]Optional Files:

[/u]Cleaned Tame Beast.esp:
[list][*]This is a "dirty edit" free rendition of the original mod's .esp[/*]
[*][b][i]The Original Mod is Still Necessary to Install! [/i][/b](See the CleanedTameBeast.rar's README for Installation and Uninstallation instructions)[/*]
[/list]
author: DragonAion

files.name: TameBeastPatch.esp
files.changelogHtml:
Changed the Tame Beast spell titles to remove grammar and spelling mistakes
Changed the Tame Beast spell descriptions to remove grammar and spelling mistakes, and to make it more lore-friendly
